alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Eastern Norfolk; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Essex; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 10:58AM EST until February 26 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and some sleet possible too generally near and south of the Massachusetts turnpike. Snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, eastern, northeastern and western Massachusetts. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel will continue to be difficult this morning and early afternoon as snow mixes with sleet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Improving conditions this afternoon especially along the coast as temps rise above freezing and precipitation becomes rather light. A second round of mainly light snow will result in renewed slippery travel late this afternoon and evening with the focus across central and eastern Massachusetts.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
